Title: Sense/Net Clock Portlet
Description: An animated clock portlet for Sense/Net ECMS.
HomeWiki:
Sense/Net Clock Portlet

An animated clock portlet for Sense/Net ECMS.

View the Demo!

The Portlet

This potlet shows a widely configurable and asynchronous animated clock.
Supported clock types:
  1. Plain Text
  2. Digital
  3. Binary
  4. Hand Clock

You can select any Time Zone available on your server. From now on you can add a CustomCss Class to your portlet, and with the power of CSS you can design the look and feel of your clock as you wish.

Go to the Download section, then please visit the Documentation for installation and configuration instructions.
